VirtualAccountId.title: Virtual Account ID
VirtualAccountId.description: Account identifier used to uniquely identify the virtual account.

AccountId.title: Account ID
AccountId.description: Unique identifier for the real account associated with the virtual account.

BatchId.title: Batch Identifier
BatchId.description: Unique batch identifier specified while creating a batch of virtual accounts.

Owner.title: Owner
Owner.description: The name used to identify the legal owner of the virtual account.

Status.title: Status
Status.description: The current status of the virtual account.

TimestampCreated.title: Virtual Account Creation Time
TimestampCreated.description: Date and time the virtual account was created. Time in UTC.

Identifier.title: Identifier
Identifier.description: Unique virtual account identifier value that corresponds to the specified virtual account identifier kind.

Kind.title: Kind
Kind.description: The kind of virtual account identifier provided to uniquely identify the virtual account.

AccountStatus.description: Current status of the virtual account.
